mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `order` (id, price,buyer_id, seller_id, seller_fee, buyer_fee,create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{buyerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sellerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sellerFee,typeHandler=com.breeze.util.MybatisJsonTypeHandler}, #{buyerFee,typeHandler=com.breeze.util.MybatisJsonTypeHandler}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
mapper.update: UPDATE `order` SET price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, buyer_id = #{buyerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, seller_id = #{sellerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, seller_fee = #{sellerFee,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, buyer_fee = #{buyerFee,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(o.seller_id) FROM `order` o WHERE o.status_id=1 AND o.seller_id=#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} GROUP BY o.seller_id
SELECT COUNT(o.buyer_id) FROM `order` o WHERE o.status_id=1 AND o.buyer_id=#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} GROUP BY o.buyer_id

SELECT t.amount amount,t.create_time createTime FROM `transaction` t JOIN product_bid_deposit_transaction pbdt ON pbdt.transaction_id=t.id JOIN product_bid pb ON pb.id=pbdt.product_bid_id JOIN `order` o ON o.id=t.out_trade_no WHERE pb.user_id=#{buyerId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND pb.user_id=o.buyer_id

SELECT t.amount,t.create_time createTime FROM `order` o JOIN `transaction` t ON o.id=t.out_trade_no JOIN product_ask_deposit_transaction padt ON padt.transaction_id=t.id JOIN product_ask pa ON pa.id=padt.product_ask_id WHERE pa.user_id=#{sellerId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND o.seller_id=pa.user_id

SELECT o.id id,buyer.id buyerId,buyer.`name` buyerName,seller.id sellerId,seller.name sellerName,p.id productId,p.name productName,pi.url masterPicture,o.price totalPrices,ost2.id statusId,ost2.`name` statusName,depositTime.create_time depositTime,paymentTime.create_time paymentTime FROM `order` o JOIN `user` buyer ON buyer.id=o.buyer_id JOIN `user` seller ON seller.id=o.seller_id JOIN product_order po ON po.order_id=o.id JOIN product p ON p.id=po.product_id JOIN product_image pi ON pi.product_id =p.id JOIN order_status os ON os.order_id=o.id JOIN order_status_type ost ON ost.id=os.status_type_id JOIN order_state_type ost2 ON ost.order_state_id=ost2.id JOIN order_deposit_transaction odt ON odt.order_id =o.id JOIN order_payment_transaction opt ON opt.order_id =o.id JOIN `transaction` depositTime ON depositTime.id=odt.transaction_id JOIN `transaction` paymentTime ON paymentTime.id=opt.transaction_id WHERE ost2.id={status,jdbcType=BIGINT}
